Class Player

  • Object
    • Actor
      • Group
        • GameActor

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, GameObject, Living, IDInterface, Cullable
    public class Player
extends GameActorTextured
implements Entity, Living
    Définie un personnage contrôlable : un joueur
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
    See Also:
    Entity, Living
